entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is the first judge mentioned in the chapter. She raises her wand and shoots out a long silver ribbon that twists into a figure eight.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is Harry's friend who is watching the Quidditch match. He comments on the judges' scores.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is a judge in the Quidditch match. He shoots a number nine into the air.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a judge in the Quidditch match. He puts up a nine.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is a judge in the Quidditch match. He shoots a ten into the air.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a judge in the Quidditch match. He pauses for a moment before shooting out a four.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a student who is mentioned as receiving a score of ten from Karkaroff.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story. He is watching the Quidditch match and reacting to the judges' scores.

relationships.description: Karkaroff gave Krum a score of ten.
Ludo Bagman gave Harry Potter a score of ten.
